Articles.Content:
So i was playing ksp and noticed there is red dot on my base on minmus.

Iam wondereng what does it mean?

Does it replace ksp if it is closer than ksp? Completely or just delay thing? What are requirments to make that base again? Iam preparing to create new orbiting one (if can be done) because current delay is over a minute so no ideal. also my minmus base was not connected to ksp and i could send data (i was confused but tought i was connected somehow).

thanks

It means you accidentally made a command center. Congratulations. Yes, it does replace the KSC for control (not science transmission though).

EDIT: A command center is 6 (I think) kerbals and a RC-L01 Guidance Unit, if you wanted to know.
